about.content: Computer and Systems Engineer and Web Developer with experience in agile methodologies. Proficient in technologies such as JavaScript, Python, React, Node.js, and Relational & No Relational databases. Proven track record in efficient problem solving, with demonstrated  ability to quickly adapt to new technologies and development  environments.

items: Collaborated with a team of systems engineers developing the front end of a recipe book to allow students to create, edit and share recipes.
Developed the front-end of a platform for freelancers focused on the recruitment and creation of medical services  using SCRUM methodology.
Experience with React.js to build several interactive SPAs.
Provide competitive programming tutorials in C++ and Python, guiding students to improve their skills in algorithms and data structures.
Keep up to date through extensive research and constant review of technical documentation related to algorithms and  data structures.
Active participant in national and international competitions, such as the ICPC, CCPL, Codeforces Divs and RPC.

item.projectDescription: This system has been developed as part of a research project at the University of Cundinamarca Extension Facatativá, with the aim of providing students in the Psychology program with a support tool for the diagnosis of depressive disorders.Using advanced machine learning techniques, the system analyzes clinical data to identify patterns and risk factors associated with depressive disorders, providing a complementary tool to professional clinical judgment.

item.projectTitle: Emotional Mitigation Playlist Recomendator W/ Spotify Playlists
item.projectDescription: I developed a complete desktop application with MATLAB App Designer for butterfly classification. The main tool allows the user to upload an image, and using a trained neural network model, the system identifies and predicts the butterfly species. The project demonstrates an end-to-end machine learning workflow. In addition to the classification app, I created separate modules for model training and image processing. The latter utility allows you to dynamically load and apply different kernels (defined in a JSON) to visualize how filters affect feature extraction.

I developed a complete desktop application with MATLAB App Designer for butterfly classification, the main tool allows the user to upload an image, and using a trained neural network model; the system identifies and predicts the butterfly species. The project demonstrates an end-to-end machine learning workflow. In addition to the classification app, I created separate modules for model training and image processing. The latter utility allows you to dynamically load and apply different kernels (defined in a JSON) to visualize how filters affect feature extraction.
Python + Keras Deep Learning Model to recognize and detect emotions on a song and recommend an opposite sentiment based playlist

items: Systems Architectures & Relational / No Relational Databases
